snippet: Encouraging unemployment data helped bolster optimism that the rally might last.
abstract: Decisive moves by the head of the European Central Bank to preserve the euro zone pushes the Standard & Poor's 500-stock index to a four-year high; Labor Department reports the number of people filing for jobless benefits fell 12,000 from the previous week, bolstering optimism that the rally might last.
lead_paragraph: Encouraging unemployment data helped bolster optimism that the rally might last.

headline.seo: Buoyed by European Action, Markets Soar to a Four-Year High
headline.main: Buoyed by European Commitment to Buy Debt, Markets Soar to a Four-Year High
headline.print_headline: Buoyed by European Commitment to Buy Debt, Markets Soar to a Four-Year High
